desc: Co-creator of open source project: Eloqua Speech Listening App
Responsible for most of the coding work
Integration with thirty-party APIs and cloud tools like Firebase
Developed and submitted analytical reports for corporate overseas projects
Worked in a small team to convert supplier needs questionnaires into online forms using polling apps like LimeSurvey
Conferred with engineering colleagues in development planning of e-commerce websites for customers
Developed and administered contracts with overseas business partners
Responsible for translation and quality assurance of project documentation in English
